instructions: In FaceTime, tap the Add button at the top right. Type the name or number you want to call in the entry field at the top, then tap Video to make a video call or tap Audio to make a FaceTime audio call. You can also tap the Add Contact button to open Contacts and start your call from there.
In the Messages conversation, tap the profile picture, the My Account button , or the name at the top of the conversation. Tap FaceTime.
